set

Class UserSetUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • set.UserSetUp

  • public class UserSetUp
extends java.lang.Object
    this class setup the userBoard put 5 different ships with length: 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 then print the "all set" message

      • setUpLocation

        public static int[][] setUpLocation(int[][] location)
        this method set the location of one ship and check if the input is legal we have to prevent the user to enter non-integer or integers which too big or too small
        Parameters:
        location - the integer 2D array to put the coordinate of two ends of ship
        Returns:
        the 2D array of location which represent the ship's location

      • setUpOneShip

        public static boolean setUpOneShip(char[][] userBoard,
                                   int[][] location,
                                   boolean fail)
        this method put the ship into the userBoard, which set ships by change seaSymbol to shipSymbol in the userBoard.
        Parameters:
        userBoard - the 2D char array which represent users' sea
        location - the 2D integer array which represent the ship's location
        fail - the boolean which decide whether to input again
        Returns:
        the boolean which decide whether to input again
